Created an attachment (id=84522)
log File with the SQLException

Windows XP; Data Tools 1.5.1.200709261

Working with the mysql-connector-java-5.0.8, the following SQLException was raised :

"java.sql.SQLException: Cannot convert value '0000-00-00 00:00:00' from column 5 to TIMESTAMP.
	at com.mysql.jdbc.ResultSet.getTimestampFromBytes(ResultSet.java:6864) (cont)..."

I had no output at all from the SQL Results View component, not even for telling me that it wasn't it's fault.

traces.message: Cannot convert value '0000-00-00 00:00:00' from column 5 to TIMESTAMP.
